About

Hi there!

I’m a Computer Science (HCI Option) student with a Fine Arts Studio Minor at the University of Waterloo. I’m also a research assistant in the HCI Research Lab.

I’m a designer and developer obsessed with polymer clay (I run a YouTube channel dedicated to the craft and wrote a book about it too!), fascinated with typography, and captivated by code.

Check out my portfolio and résumé.
